item.title: Pumpkin Latte Beer and Ace Pumpkin Cider
item.description: This year while out shopping for turkey and wine, I discovered a couple of very fallish, and very Thanksgiving-appropriate beverages I thought I’d share with you all. One is a new seasonal coffee brew from my favorite DFW brewery Martin House, and the other is a special cider I haven’t seen in three years â€” Ace’s own extraordinary Pumpkin Cider. Read on!
